related_questions.question: What is an affiliate fee?
related_questions.snippet: Media companies primarily derive their revenues mainly from affiliate fees and advertising. Affiliate fees are the carriage fees paid per month per subscriber by MVPDs (multichannel video programming distributors) like Comcast (CMCSA) and Dish Network (DISH).Mar 15, 2016
